summary:
A dynamic professional managing leadership roles with a rapidly progressive career span of 17+ years, I have gained exposure and cross cultural experience in  handling customer relationship management, key account management,  business development, strategy planning ability to nurture superior client relationships that deliver significant sales growth. Strong orientation to provide value to clients through strong engagement and account management. Competent to build C-Level relationships. Proficient in  providing a fresh vision of customer excellence and driving action plans to position business as the market leading provider of customer support. 
I have a solid track record in developing and implementing strategic plans to develop new business aligned with organization’s objectives. Proven ability launching & supporting products and services, penetrate new markets and increase sales profitability. Adept in market research and monitoring competitor’s activities. I am skilled in improving customer service processes , policies & standards for benefits of customers as well as organization or department.  
Efficient Team Leader & Player possessing demonstrable leadership capabilities in managing complex business challenges, mentoring & driving results through active engagement of employees in line with organization's vision and goals .My outstanding interpersonal and communications skills , continuous learning  along with my positive attitude are major assets that have helped me surpass expectations in this profession.

school.name: University of Mumbai - MGM college of engineering anf Technology

awards.title: Award for Leadership and Talent development

profile_positions.description: Ultrasound S&SD P&L, execution of improvement activities, margin improvement & productivity, KPIs to manage performance of the S&SD business, daily management of performance with colleagues, markets and partners, collaboration across functions and markets to gather feedback on existing improvement opportunities and identify new opportunities / projects .
profile_positions.title: Global Service and Solutions Delivery Performance Manager - Precision Diagnostics Ultrasound

profile_positions.description: Direct service delivery & customer success strategy  to cultivate strong customer & partner relationships and meet strategic business objectives; improve financial performance and quality standards. Oversee customer lifecycle to enhance customer experience, meet contractual obligations, and provide tailored solutions for diverse clientele. Develop business plans to maximize operational efficiency, achieve P&L targets, and improve customer NPS. Cultivate performance culture and champion professional development; evaluate team performance, identify capacity gaps, and mentor staff to meet long-term goals.
profile_positions.title: Head Customer Service & Solutions , Africa

profile_positions.description: As a commercial leader, drove Service ( complete portfolio ) , Upgrade  ( Expand) business (P&L) and service marketing operations across Indian subcontinent; developed innovative business growth strategies to enhance client experience, achieve integral gross margin targets, and ensure sustainable financial performance. Created annual operating and customer relationship management plans to meet strategic business objectives. Led cross-functional teams to secure and cultivate long-term partnerships with key clients.
profile_positions.title: Head Customer service business & Marketing

profile_positions.description: Led activities to optimize customer experience (CX) across India and neighbouring countries; service delivery, business growth, client relations, cost control, contract management, and P&L. Strategized account management for service portfolio; delivered strategic leadership to ensure long-term growth. Partnered with Global Customer Experience team to implement Philips strategic CX vision for Indian market; coordinated long-term partnerships with key clients in HS Indian subcontinent. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to streamline service delivery; supported sales teams to meet set targets.
profile_positions.title: General Manager - Customer Support | Customer experience and CS key account management

profile_positions.description:
•	Radically managed North & East Regions including neighboring countries (Nepal & Bangladesh) & revenue of USD 18M, Handled CS profitability, C-Delight , NPS , Talent development , explored potential and enhanced productivity. 
•	Delegated to supervise team of 85 employees with responsibilities like fostering team efforts, succession planning & talent development. Proficiently re-settled AOP (Business & Delivery) for the regions and deploying it across territories
•	Successfully enhanced customer experience & deepened relationships with key accounts; facilitated business growth and market share through profound customer service
Achievements:
•	Bagged President Award for Talent & People Development in  year 2014
•	Progressively worked & received special recognition for PLS (Philips Lifecycle Solutions) selling in year 2014
profile_positions.title: General Manager - Customer Support

profile_positions.description:
•	Amplified CS business in terms of revenue & profitability by successfully managing business of USD 11M & the entire operations with a team of 50 employees
•	Provided efficient service to customers in a reasonable time, minimized resolution time, continuously improved quality of service and built strong customer relations
•	Deftly synchronised refurbishment in revenue through contract penetration, selling spares parts, PLS (upgrades) and reconditioned machines
•	Turned around the employee engagement index significantly and facilitated regional revenue growth
•	Insightfully recorded & controlled KPIs, managed goal setting, annual operating plan, deployed team targets and streamlined the processes (continuous improvement) to ensure the smooth operations and business

Achievements:
•	Merit of being awarded with The Best CS Region Award in year 2011 & 2013 and The Best CS Growth Region Award in year 2012
•	Successfully improved the employee engagement index from 30% to 82% and facilitated regional revenue growth by 69% in 3 year
•	Efficiently achieved the high value PLS Upgrade Deals & reconditioned CT, MRI business
profile_positions.title: Regional Manager - Customer Support

profile_positions.description:
•	Spearheaded channel operations and business (service contracts and trade), implemented effective strategies to maximize channel business revenue
•	Accomplished financially strong and reliable channel partners for deeper market penetration; provided training & direction to channel partners for ensuring quality performance
•	Monitored & controlled channel partners effectively to attain business parameters like volumes, market share, billing, collection, exchanges and implementing strategies to improve profitability through them
•	Oversaw uptime of the equipment, supply of spare-parts, response time to the customer calls, uptime of machines Attended and resolved customer escalations in order to ensure customer delight
profile_positions.title: Regional Channel Manager- Customer Support   - West ( key market)

profile_positions.description:
•	Proficiently headed revenue targets of USD 2M (Contract Revenue & Spare Part Revenue); sold field upgrades like II to FD cathlab upgrades, various software & hardware upgrades, MRI RF coils etc.
•	Accountable for assuring both customer satisfaction ratings and Net promoter score through timely service delivery
•	Stringently handled the expectations YOY and generated more than 97% of customer’s satisfaction as well as handled key accounts & luminary management
•	Deftly supervised & monitored uptime of machines , response time of FSEs, resolved customer escalations/ business issues, managed installation and handing over of machines
•	Revamped the processes to ensure the smooth operations and business by following various processes like VIPER & POLARIS
•	Successfully generated & managed performance appraisal of the team members
•	Responsible for conducting training plans 

Achievements:
•	Meticulously handled team on 10 FSEs, recruited new team members for expansion, setup and assigned the targets, KRAs, KPIs for the team
•	Bagged Best People Manager of The Year Award by Philips Healthcare 2010 with 99% of PLI score & PLI interview was published in the global newsletter by HR
profile_positions.title: Territory Manager - Customer Support

profile_positions.description:
•	Discreetly completed 18 months GET program after campus placement in final year of engineering
•	Instrumental role in executing  9 cathlab projects in western region as well as handling the installation and maintenance of Philips Cathlabs: HM2000, H3000, H5000, Allura series & FLAT DETECTOR (FD10, FD20) , Biplane cathlabs . Multimodality experience on CT, MRI , Nuclear Medicine and Ultrasound
•	Proficiently handled technical escalations; generated customer satisfaction through quick response time , maximum uptime, minimum turnaround time and solution driven approach towards customers

Undergone in depth trainings at The Netherlands and Singapore
profile_positions.title: Engineer - Customer Support
